chinese: 把……分类，整理，挑选 n.种类
我将书按大小分成了几摞。
english: I sorted the books into piles of big ones and small ones

chinese: ad）. 军事的 n. 军队
大学新生需要参加军训。
english: University freshmen are required to participate in military training

chinese: n.巡逻兵 w.巡逻；巡查，巡游
战后，巡逻兵正在搜寻废墟。
english: The patrols are searching the ruins after the war

chinese: n.融合，整合
与人工智能的融合将会改变汽车行业。
english: The integration of AI will revolutionize the automotive industry

chinese: 以 剥皮，削皮，去壳 n，果皮，外皮
这个男人正在削土豆皮。
n.婚约，订婚；约会，约定
我们上周宣布了订婚的消息，所以现在大家都知道我们要结婚了。
english: We announced our engagement last week, so now everybody knows we're getting married

chinese: n.假释；特别口令 v，有条件释放，假释
在保释期，被释放的囚犯必须遵守相关条件。
english: When on parole, a released prisoner must not break the conditions

chinese: 诊断
我的诊断结果是：你的心脏有个小毛病。
english: My diagnosis is that you have a minor heart problem

chinese: v. 迁徒；迁移
有些乌会飞到南方过冬。
english: Some birds migrate south for the winter

chinese: ad）. 遗传的
一看到她母亲，我就明白了她的金发是遗传的。
english: Once I saw her mother, I realized that her blonde hair must be genetic

chinese: n. 糕点，点心
我特别喜欢这种糕点。我要把它们全部吃完！
english: I love the pastry so much, I'll eat them

chinese: n.航海，航行 vi.航海
这艘船正在航行中。
english: The ship is on a voyage now

chinese: adj.有机的
我们没有使用化肥，这是纯天然有机食物
english: We don't use chemical fertilizer, this is natural organic food

chinese: 文盲，无知
看不懂这本书是因为我无知或愚蠢吗？
english: Is it illiteracy or stupidity that stops me from understanding this book

chinese: adj.突起的，显眼的
田地里一棵孤零零的树会更显眼。
english: A single tree in a field will appear to be more prominent

chinese: v.中止
风暴来袭时上校中止了任务。
english: The captain aborted the mission when the huge storm hit
